q_and_a_content.title: How do I purchase a product?
q_and_a_content.description: All purchases are handled manually through our Discord server. Join the server, open a support ticket, and a staff member will assist you with your purchase.

q_and_a_content.title: What payment methods do you accept?
q_and_a_content.description: We currently accept Bitcoin (BTC), Solana (SOL), Amazon Vouchers (EUR only), and Paysafecard (EUR only). More payment options including PayPal and credit cards are coming soon.

q_and_a_content.title: Are the free tools really free?
q_and_a_content.description: Yes! Free tools are hosted on GitHub and are completely free to use. You can download them directly from the product page without any payment or account required.

q_and_a_content.title: How does Auto Update work?
q_and_a_content.description: When Auto Update is enabled, the launcher will automatically download and apply the latest updates for your installed products without requiring any manual action.

q_and_a_content.title: What is the Closed Beta?
q_and_a_content.description: The Closed Beta gives selected users early access to new features and tools. Beta testers who participate will receive a permanent Unlock All account granting lifetime access to all tools on the platform.

q_and_a_content.title: How do coupon codes work?
q_and_a_content.description: Coupon codes can be entered in the product purchase modal or at checkout to receive a discount. Codes are distributed through our Discord server and promotional events.
